column4: When I type ifconfig, my ip etc isn't shown, but instead I am shown all my network devices. Why is this?
ok, I just have this memory of using it before, and it showed me the same results that I get in windows when typing ipconfig /all
I am told that this is what ifconfig does http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/6c/Ipconfig_win_xp.png but it doedn't do it for me
